Problems with the "install license prosedure"? First make shure to folow the text file in the crack folder on disk one. 

Still no luck? Then, in the FlexLM license utillities -> System Settings -> Etheret Address (As described in the text file) there should be something like "0015307eb65h" in that field, only different numbers. If so things should be all right. But if the fiels contains more numbers, like "0015307eb65h 000cb0f13bd5" you have to copy only one of them. 

This happens when you have more then one network cards on your system. Usually laptops with wireless and a ethernet port, but also some other systems as well. The numbers are your network cards uniqe adress, also known as MAC adress.
